title: Novak Djokovic claims he had COVID-19 last month and met the requirements to travel to Australia
content:
1. Novak Djokovic claims he had COVID-19 last month and met the requirements to travel to Australia  USA TODAY

  3. Djokovic's Australian Open Covid vaccine debacle is self-made martyrdom  NBC News
  4. Novak Djokovic was granted vaccine exemption after testing positive for Covid-19 in December, court documents show  CNN
  5. Novak Djokovic contracted COVID-19 last month, lawyers say in court filings  ESPN
